text: Ulefone has unveiled the Armor X31 Pro as the first 5G rugged smartphone in its Armor X series. It's powered by the Dimensity 6300 SoC, runs Android 14, and comes with 8GB RAM and 256GB storage onboard, expandable by up to 2TB via a microSD card. The Ulefone Armor X31 Pro has a 6.56" HD+ 120Hz LCD on the front with 800 nits peak brightness and Gorilla Glass 5 protection. There's also a 16MP camera for selfies and video calls. Around the back, we have a circular camera island housing three cameras - 64MP primary (Sony IMX682), 25MP Night Vision (Sony IMX550), and 2MP macro. These are joined by two IR LEDs, an LED flash, and what Ulefone calls an "Independent Glare Flashlight." The Independent Glare Flashlight has a maximum brightness of 120 lumens and can be quickly turned on/off with a customizable key located on the Armor X31 Pro's left-side frame. Other specs of the Ulefone Armor X31 Pro include a 6,050 mAh battery, 18W charging, NFC, IR blaster, side-mounted fingerprint scanner, MIL-STD-810H certification, and IP68/69K rating. Ulefone Armor X31 Pro's features Ulefone also announced the Armor Case for the X31 Pro. It's sold separately and features a 180-degree rotatable back clip and a carabiner for easy carrying. Other accessories available for the Armor X31 Pro include an Armor Mount, Armor Mount Pro, and a Sports Armband. These are also sold separately. Ulefone Armor X31 Pro's accessories The Ulefone Armor X31 Pro comes in Classic Black, Few Orange, and Lightsome Green colors. It's priced at $399.99 (€385/INR33,980) and will be sold through AliExpress starting January 1, 2025, at a special price of $199.99 (€190/INR16,990). Source

Ulefone has unveiled the Armor X31 Pro as the first 5G rugged smartphone in its Armor X series. It's powered by the Dimensity 6300 SoC, runs Android 14, and comes with 8GB RAM and 256GB storage onboard, expandable by up to 2TB via a microSD card.

The Ulefone Armor X31 Pro has a 6.56" HD+ 120Hz LCD on the front with 800 nits peak brightness and Gorilla Glass 5 protection. There's also a 16MP camera for selfies and video calls.

Around the back, we have a circular camera island housing three cameras - 64MP primary (Sony IMX682), 25MP Night Vision (Sony IMX550), and 2MP macro. These are joined by two IR LEDs, an LED flash, and what Ulefone calls an "Independent Glare Flashlight."

The Independent Glare Flashlight has a maximum brightness of 120 lumens and can be quickly turned on/off with a customizable key located on the Armor X31 Pro's left-side frame.

Other specs of the Ulefone Armor X31 Pro include a 6,050 mAh battery, 18W charging, NFC, IR blaster, side-mounted fingerprint scanner, MIL-STD-810H certification, and IP68/69K rating.


Ulefone Armor X31 Pro's features

Ulefone also announced the Armor Case for the X31 Pro. It's sold separately and features a 180-degree rotatable back clip and a carabiner for easy carrying. Other accessories available for the Armor X31 Pro include an Armor Mount, Armor Mount Pro, and a Sports Armband. These are also sold separately.


Ulefone Armor X31 Pro's accessories

The Ulefone Armor X31 Pro comes in Classic Black, Few Orange, and Lightsome Green colors. It's priced at $399.99 (€385/INR33,980) and will be sold through AliExpress starting January 1, 2025, at a special price of $199.99 (€190/INR16,990).
